Subject: RPG: Roleplay Podcast Game
Description: Some of the best improv I've ever been part of has been around a gaming table.  We're going to set up recording gear and then run a short gaming session.  The recording will be edited into a radio play that will be made available online right after the con. We'll be using a system that doesn't require any previous knowledge to play. All you need to bring is your willingness to get into character! This is a limited attendance event.  Please sign up in advance at Ops.  Speakers include:Jody Raiford - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes
